'RANDOM ROSES'

or MY PERSONAL TREASURE OF ITP WISDOM

Classic Holiday Collections

Some of my favourite quotes from the classes.

'What if our privacy was our OWN responsibility?'

'Doing feels so different from watching, doesn't it?'

'Programming is creativity based on logic, while interactivity happens when you teach user that logic'

'Let's take a cat in a sink. Cat is the common object, and sink is the context!'

'Data is not cold. It's our collective memory'.

'Is awareness really always so powerful?'

'Even simple interaction can produce a few levels of experience'.

'Pixels are atoms'.

'Color is always contextual'.

'When you go crazy, don’t crazy everything'.

'Always time everything by pi'.

'It is hard not to look at yellow'.

'There is NO substitute for testing'.

'Try to find your own standard'.

'If it moves, it breaks'.

'How many people would actually like to have a book and a phone in their hands simultaneously?'

'Don’t ever wait TO TEST'.

'It’s hard to play under pressure'.

'You can’t trick the Git'.

'Whatever you design, it shouldn’t come with instructions'.

'Ask yorself about your product — is it a vitamin or a pill?'

'Sometimes great UX means adding ‘a little bit more’ button'
